mapper.formula:
AND(
  {Onboarding Week} = 1,
  {Onboarding Week Day} != 1,
  {Onboarding Started} = 1,
  {Onboarding - Week 1 Tasks Sent} = 0,
  {Onboarding Paused} = 0,
  NOT({Day 1 Tasks Assigned At} = BLANK())
)

mapper.formula:
AND(
{Week Number}=1,
NOT({Day Number}=0),
NOT({Day Number}=1),
{Job}="{{408.Title}}", 
NOT({Type} = "G.Drive"),
NOT({Type} = "Managers"),
NOT({Type} = "Custom")
)

mapper.formula:
AND(
  {Week Number}={{2.week}},
  NOT({Day Number}=0),
{Job}="{{2.jobID}}", 
NOT({Type} = "G.Drive"),
NOT({Type} = "Managers"),
NOT({Type} = "Custom")
)

mapper.html:
Welcome, {{2.name}}

Good Morning! You have been assigned new tasks. Please access the dashboard using the link below.

Your Onboarding Dashboard

Access your personalised tasks and track your progress in one place

Go to Dashboard

Questions? Contact your manager or HR representative.

mapper.html:
Hi, {{2.name}}

Welcome to the team were excited to have you on board!
To make your onboarding as smooth as possible, weve set up a personalised platform just for you.

Your Onboarding Dashboard

Click the link below to access your dashboard and sign up using the email address associated with this message it only takes a minute.

Go to Dashboard

The Induction Starter Pack is attached. Please review it ahead of your first day to help you get settled in smoothly.

Questions? Contact your manager or HR representative.
mapper.subject: Welcome! Lets Get You Set Up
